name: Prologue Edition: Procession of Fire
description:
The drummers at the head of the procession could feel their heart beating in the skins of their instruments. 
Their feet were bare and quiet across the brush of the land. The sounds of the drums could be heard for miles.
They wanted you to know they were coming.
They wanted your hair to stand on end and for you to be afraid.
The amber lights of the flickering heat reflected in a thousand eyes. 
Yelping and whistling they communicated in a language of war alone.
The torches provided warmth on their naked bodies and the thoughts of retribution burned wildly in their core.
Pray the other side to be ready.
Pray for them that this battle be swift and their burials short.
